page.title: 03A SECONDARY PUPIL'S DAY
page.content: I get up at 7.30, have a shower and put on my school uniform. I have my breakfast :cereal with milk,toast and marmalade, with tea. I wash up and leave home at 8.30 to cycle to school. I meet my friends and go into school for registration at 9.00. There are four morning lessons, each lasting 40 minutes. The subjects I study are Maths,English,French,History,Chemistry and Physics. After two lessons there is a 15 minute break. Morning school ends at 12.35. Due to teachers' present industrial action, I cycle home for a snack lunch. School resumes at 1.35 with 3 more 40 minute lessons. At 3.40 school ends.I do my homework for up to 3 hours.Then I watch TV,go to Youth Club,Scouts,play cricket or work for my Bronze Duke of Edinburgh Award.I go to bed at 10.00
